query:
ALTER TABLE assessments 
ADD COLUMN complianceStatus VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN complianceIssues TEXT,
ADD COLUMN complianceRecommendations TEXT,
ADD COLUMN complianceCheckedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN complianceCheckedBy INT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute ALTER TABLE assessments 
ADD COLUMN complianceStatus VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN complianceIssues TEXT,
ADD COLUMN complianceRecommendations TEXT,
ADD COLUMN complianceCheckedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN complianceCheckedBy INT;
